rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;3a8a38dc.1501">   <title>Joint UK-China and UK Particle Technology Forum, 12-15 July 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;3a8a38dc.1501</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>On behalf of the organising committee, I would like to invite you to<br>participate in this joint conference of the 5th UK-China and 13th UK<br>Particle Technology Forum, which will be held Sunday 12 - Wednesday 15 July<br>2015 in Leeds, UK. The theme of this conference is Crossroads of Particle<br>Science and Technology. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-13T13:13:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CSCST-UK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;3a8a38dc.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d2c089a9.1412">   <title>Re: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d2c089a9.1412</link>   <description> Hi, Dear All,<br><br>Congratulations to Jiawei for the new Chairman of CSCST-UK!<br><br>We also would like to thank Shanning Dong and his team for their contribution to CSCST-UK and organising successful annual meetings.<br>We hope that the transition between two Chairmans/teams can become smooth!<br><br>Wish you all a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-24T09:01:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>XU Cigang</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d2c089a9.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;fdf38715.1412">   <title>Merry Christmas and Happy New Year </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;fdf38715.1412</link>   <description> Dear CSCST members,<br><br>Merry Christmas and Happy New Year.<br><br>It\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds a great honour for me to be elected as the new chairman of CSCST-UK.<br>The organization is such a great platform to bring all Chinese chemical<br>engineers and scientists together. I will work closely with the next (15th)<br>Executive Committee to maintain the healthy operation of the community. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-23T21:31:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jiawei Wang</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;fdf38715.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5d5eb726.1412">   <title>Two PhD studentships at University of Southamphton </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5d5eb726.1412</link>   <description> Merry Christmas!<br><br>Please find below two PhD studentships?<br><br>http://www.findaphd.com/search/ProjectDetails.aspx?PJID=60030&amp;LID=1427<br><br>http://www.findaphd.com/search/ProjectDetails.aspx?PJID=59047&amp;LID=1427<br><br>Best Regards<br>shoufeng    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-18T16:11:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nigel S Dong</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5d5eb726.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2cd042a4.1412">   <title>Fwd: Fw: PhD studentship available </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2cd042a4.1412</link>   <description> Dear all,<br>please find below a PhD studentship at University of East Anglia.<br><br>Regards,<br>Shanning<br><br>*Sent:* Wednesday, December 10, 2014 at 2:59 PM<br>*From:* &quot;Yimin Chao (CHE)&quot; &lt;Y.Chao@uea.ac.uk&gt;<br>*To:* &quot;chair@cscst.org&quot; &lt;chair@cscst.org&gt;<br>*Subject:* PhD studentship available<br><br>Dear Dr Dong,<br><br>I have a studentship available, see link here:<br><br>http://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/AKA585/phd-studentship-biodegradable-carbohydrate-nanoparticle-dual-loaded-with-fluorescent-quantum-dots-and-anti-cancer-drugs-for-targeted-and-monitored-delivery-chao_u15ep/<br><br>If you could forward this information to your society members it would be<br>highly appreciated. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-18T14:59:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CSCST-UK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2cd042a4.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;14c4ac6a.1412">   <title>Results of the chairman election </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;14c4ac6a.1412</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>On behalf of the Society, I am pleased to announce that Dr Wang Jiawei has<br>been elected as the next chairman of CSCST-UK. Dr Wang received his PhD<br>from Nottingham University and is now a lecturer at Aston University. Many<br>congratulations to Dr Wang! The Scientific Committee and I strongly believe<br>CSCST under his leadership will continue its dedication to serve the<br>general Chinese research community in the chemical engineering and<br>chemistry field in the UK. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-18T14:44:25+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CSCST-UK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;14c4ac6a.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;a07fd543.1411">   <title>CSCST chairman election </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;a07fd543.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>As you might know, the Chinese Society of Chemical Science and Technology<br>(CSCST) changes its executive committee every two years. Therefore, we are<br>now calling for candidates for the next chairman of CSCST. The candidate<br>needs to be a senior postdoctoral researcher, a junior lecturer or<br>equivalent in experience. If you are interested, please send your CV to me (<br>nigel.dong@gmail.com) by 30th November 2014. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T18:28:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CSCST-UK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;a07fd543.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5e3d7625.1410">   <title>Job Opportunities in the Zhejiang University of Technology </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5e3d7625.1410</link>   <description> Dear all, I just joined the Zhejiang University of Technology as a Qianjiang Scholar from Cambridge University . I would like to inform you that Mr Chen Jun\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdthe vice director of the human resource department, is going to visit Edinburgh and London between 19th and 22nd next month. If you are interested in seeking a job opportunity in Hangzhou, one of the most beautiful cities in China, please get in touch with him ( bec@zjut.edu.cn) at your earliest conveniene . Please see the attachment for more information about this rapidly developing university, and any further enquires will be responsed ASAP [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-30T14:58:45+08:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;5e3d7625.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d9ce59b0.1410">   <title>Postdoc position available on hydrogen supply chain </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d9ce59b0.1410</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>There is a vacancy for a postdoc/research associate position on hydrogen supply chain systems and optimisation in the Department of Chemical Engineering, UCL.<br>Please click here for more information&lt;https://atsv7.wcn.co.uk/search_engine/jobs.cgi?amNvZGU9MTQ0MDkyNSZ2dF90ZW1wbGF0ZT05NjUmb3duZXI9NTA0MTE3OCZvd25lcnR5cGU9ZmFpciZicmFuZF9pZD0wJmpvYl9yZWZfY29kZT0xNDQwOTI1JnBvc3RpbmdfY29kZT0yMjQmcmVxc2lnPTE0MTM1MzY4ODYtMjI1MjdjZjZkZTNiNjk0NGE4MWMzY2IxNDk4M2YwYTllN2Q2OWYxYg%3D%3D&amp;jcode=1440925&amp;vt_template=965&amp;owner=5041178&amp;ownertype=fair&amp;brand_id=0&amp;job_ref_code=1440925&amp;posting_code=224&amp;reqsig=1413536886-22527cf6de3b6944a81c3cb14983f0a9e7d69f1b&gt; .<br><br>If you know someone else who are suitable for such a position, please do forward the advert on.<br>Thanks.<br><br>Best regards,<br>Songsong    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-29T16:00:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Liu, Songsong</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d9ce59b0.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;61cbf0f2.1410">   <title>CSCSTUK Chairman election </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;61cbf0f2.1410</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>The 21st CSCSTUK-SCI annual conference has been successfully held at<br>University of Surrey on 25th October 2014. A conference summary report is<br>now available on CSCST\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds website:<br>http://www.cscst.org/2014/10/28/summery-of-the-21st-joint-annual-conference-of-cscst-sci/<br><br>This year\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds annual conference also capped off my two year term as chairman<br>of CSCSTUK. I have received tremendous help and support from the executive<br>committee and the scientific committee, which I am very grateful for. I<br>would like to thank especially Dr Jerry Heng of Imperial College London and<br>Dr Tao Chen and Professor Charley Wu of University of Surrey for their<br>assistance with organising the annual conferences. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-29T07:33:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>CSCST-UK</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;61cbf0f2.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2253484.1410">   <title>CSCST 2014 annual Conference: Abstract Deadline extended to 15th October </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2253484.1410</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Sorry for cross-posting!<br><br>Just wish to let you know that the deadline for submitting an abstract to the above conference has been extended to 15th October.<br><br>The conference is the 21st annual conference of the Chinese Society of Chemical Science and Technology (CSCST) will be held at University of Surrey on Saturday 25th October 2014. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-07T02:33:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nigel S Dong</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;2253484.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;6d6b95d5.1409">   <title>[CSCST-UK] 2014\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd / East Lake International Forum for Outstanding Overseas Young Scholars (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;6d6b95d5.1409</link>   <description> Dear Members of CSCST-UK, Please find the conference information below, with international flight tickets to Wuhan covered by the organiser for invited attendees. <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;bf045c03.1409</link>   <description> Electrochemical Technologies for Electricity Storage and Renewable Fuels Production Call for Papers Special Issue in Journal of Chemistry (a SCI Journal) Dear members of CSCST-UK \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd The rapidly increasing global energy demand appeals to further research and development on electrochemical energy conversion. Both chemical-to-electricity and electricity-to-chemical technologies are of key importance to improve the overall efficiency and safety of the energy system. Recently electrochemical energy conversion devices (e.g., redox flow batteries, lithium-ion batteries, fuel cells, capacitors, and water electrolysers) are obtaining rapid improvements and various new types of devices are emerging. This special issue intends to cover major research topics [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-28T22:57:22+08:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Prof Jingping Hu</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;bf045c03.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d108abc4.1409">   <title>3rd Call for CSCST-SCI 2014 conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CSCST;d108abc4.1409</link>   <description> Dear colleagues,<br><br>*Please note that the deadline for abstract submission is now postponed to<br>10th October 2014.*<br><br>On behalf of the Chinese Society of Chemical Science and Technology in the<br>UK (CSCSTK) and the Society of Chemical Industry (SCI), we cordially invite<br>you to participate in the 21st Joint Annual Conference of CSCST-SCI<br>&lt;http://conference2014.cscst.org/&gt;, which will be hosted by the Department<br>of Chemical and Process Engineering of University of Surrey on Saturday<br>25th October 2014.
